name: electric arc furnace slag to market for electric arc furnace slag, for recovery | electric arc furnace slag | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23504/documentation

This is a renaming activity. Its purpose is to link 'electric arc furnace slag' to the 'market for electric arc furnace slag, for recovery'. This represents the share of electric arc furnace slag that is recovered for use via internal (in iron and steelmaking) or external routes (e.g. cement making).Through this renaming, the by-product classification of the electric arc furnace slag is changed from 'waste' to 'recyclable material'.

Activity starts with the reception of 'electric arc furnace slag'.

Activity ends with the 'electric arc furnace slag, for recovery' being ready for transportation.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste
